DOC.brief_summary: The i-gel new supra glottic airway device non inflatable cuff oesophageal vent . The aim study compare device LMA ProSeal . The study approve institutional ethic committee . 222 patient enrol group . The objective study compare insertion success rate , leak pressure , ventilatory parameter adverse event rate .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Type Laryngeal Mask : I-Gel & LMA ProSeal
DOC.detailed_description: Supraglottic airway device widely use surgery require general anesthesia . Airway device safe morbidity rate low . The i-gel ( Intersurgical Ltd , Wokingham , Berkshire , UK ) new single-use non-inflatable supraglottic airway device evaluate comparative study . The aim study compare i-gel LMA ProSeal randomize study . Anesthesia protocol standardize . The supraglottic device compare term insertion success rate , leak pressure , ventilatory parameter adverse event . The aim demonstrate enhancement term insertion success rate diminution adverse event . Statistical analysis use percentage , confidence interval chi 2 Fischer 's exact test qualitative data . Quantitative data analyze mean , standard deviation . Comparison make student test wilcoxon test . P < 0,05 statistically significant .
DOC.criteria: Weight > 30 kg Surgery allow use laryngeal mask airway management Written inform consent Difficult intubation criterion ( define French AnesthesiaReanimation Society ) Pulmonary disease Gastroesophageal reflux antecedent Coeliosurgery Inhalation risk Hiatus hernia
